key.name: warp-cursor
key.summary: Should the cursor warp to newly focused windows

key.name: single-tagset
key.summary: Should tag be shared between monitors

key.name: show-layout
key.summary: Show the layout icon on the panel

key.name: show-tags
key.summary: Show the tags icon on the panel

key.name: active-tags-color
key.summary: The color of the active tags on the panel

key.name: tag-names
key.summary: The name of the tags

key.name: focus-border
key.summary: Show window border on focused window

key.name: focus-border-color
key.summary: The focused border's color

key.name: gap-size
key.summary: The size of the gap between windows in the workarea

key.name: outer-gap-size
key.summary: The size of the gap between windows and the edge of the monitor

key.name: smart-gaps
key.summary: True to hide gaps when there is a single window

key.name: set-layout-tiling
key.summary: Switch to the tiling layout

key.name: set-layout-monocle
key.summary: Switch to the monocle layout

key.name: set-layout-floating
key.summary: Switch to the floating layout

key.name: set-layout-deck
key.summary: Switch to the deck layout

key.name: cycle-next
key.summary: Cycle next

key.name: cycle-prev
key.summary: Cycle prev

key.name: incrmfact
key.summary: Increase the master area

key.name: decrmfact
key.summary: Decrease the master area

key.name: incrnmaster
key.summary: Increase the number of windows in the master area

key.name: decrnmaster
key.summary: Decrease the number of windows in the master area

key.name: swap-next
key.summary: Swap the current window with next

key.name: swap-prev
key.summary: Swap the current window with previous

key.name: zoom
key.summary: Swap the current window with the master
